Nothing is more valuable than life itself.

topics.body:
"@hype":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/559c828e6368720392001473#post_559c828e6368720392001473
But it also makes you realize that a lot of things in life, despite looking insignificant, is so valuable.

It like having a balloon. The balloon represents life. Sure, it looks insignificant but fill it with water that represents experience, it'll be large enough and fun enough to throw at somebody. The balloon itself looks insignificant but the experiences itself is what makes it valuable.
